text: Nebojša "Glogi" Glogovac (30 August 1969 – 9 February 2018) was a Serbian actor. He was born in Trebinje, SR Bosnia and Herzegovina. He was known for his roles in Tomorrow Morning (2006), Klopka (2007), 72 Days (2010) and The Constitution (2016). Glogovac died on 9 February 2018 in Belgrade, Serbia of brain cancer at the age of 48. ==References== ==Other websites== * Nebojša Glogovac at imdb.com Category:1969 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from brain cancer Category:Serbian movie actors Category:Serbian television actors Category:Voice actors
title: Nebojša Glogovac
